tool_description: Real-time MLB and College Baseball hub, your one-stop destination for all things baseball. Stay updated with live scores, detailed stats, game data, odds, standings, and highlights from both MLB and college baseball games. Dive deeper with game recaps, post-game conferences, and jaw-dropping plays, all available in real time.
name: MLB, College Baseball API
title: MLB, College Baseball API

api_list.name: TeamController_getTeams
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all teams.

records.description: Team records for the current year/season.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.

api_list.name: TeamController_getTeamById
api_list.description: Retrieve team details by team id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mlb-college-baseball-api.p.rapidapi.com/teams/219"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mlb-college-baseball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mlb-college-baseball-api.p.rapidapi.com/teams/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mlb-college-baseball-api.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: BaseballStandingsController_getStandings
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all standings based on passed query parameters.

api_list.name: HighlightsController_getHighlights
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all highlights.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

url.description: Url location of the video highlight.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.
